meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Sovereign</kanji> <kanji>government</kanji> and <kanji>Politics</kanji> are those who are part of the <vocabulary>imperial government</vocabulary>. This type of government is <vocabulary>imperialism</vocabulary>. Of course, back in the day there weren't as many sovereign governments out there, so imperialism is the one that fits the bill in this word's case.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
